pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Functional Linear Regression // Functions for implementing robust methods for functional linear regression. In the functional linear regression, we consider scalar-on-function linear regression and function-on-function linear regression. More details, see Beyaztas, U., and Shang, H. L. (2021) arXiv:2111.01238 and Beyaztas, U., and Shang, H. L. (2022) arXiv:2203.05065.
